p:
Nitazoxanide ( 48) is a commercially available antiprotozoal agent with potential antiviral activity against a number of viruses, including animal and human CoVs. Wang et al. recently reported that nitazoxanide inhibited SARS-CoV-2 with an EC 50 of 2.12 μM. Nafamostat ( 49), a highly efficacious inhibitor of MERS-CoV as it prevents membrane fusion, inhibited SARS-CoV-2 with an EC 50 of 22.5 μM. However, the nucleoside analog penciclovir ( 50) was required for viral inhibition, yielding an EC 50 of 95.96 μM. Further in vivo studies of the two drugs against SARS-CoV-2 infection are recommended.
